package.name: i2c_pwm
package.description:
ROS2 (robot operating system) node for controlling PWM boards based on the PCA9685 chip with an I2C interface. Primary use is for controlling RC Servos and DC motors via PWM.
Originally written by Bradan Lane at https://gitlab.com/bradanlane/ros-i2cpwmboard. Copied and modified for ROS2 as a learning experience.
